full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement ## Request for Standing Offer - Battery for Vehicles, Gensets, and Combat Support

### Call Summary
We are issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the supply of batteries for vehicles, gensets, and combat support equipment to the Department of National Defence (DND). This tender is open to all qualified suppliers.

### Tender Information

| **Tender Information** | **Details** |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Reference Number | WS4219049770-Doc4231761312 |
| Amendment Number | 3 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4219049770 |
| Publication Date | 20 October 2023 |
| Closing Date | 5 December 2023, 2:00 PM EST |

### Tender Description
This RFSO is for the supply of batteries for vehicles, gensets, and combat support equipment. The Department of National Defence (DND) is the end user for this project. The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### Additional Information
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), etc.
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Edmonton and Montréal
* Contact Information: Quiterie Garcia Lozano (SPAC/PSPC), quiterie.garcialozano@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Documents
The tender documents can be found on Ariba Discovery (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17783163?extsite=MTc3ODMxNjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Note: The closing time for this tender has been amended to 2:00 PM EST on 5 December 2023. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

This is the rewritten version of the provided text, formatted in nice markdown format with more professionalism. I have summed up the most relevant information and excluded non-essential details. The rewritten version meets the 400-word limit. 

Please let me know if you'd like any modifications or changes. I'm happy to assist you further.
